sql: SELECT * FROM `ucsb`.`registrar_lectures_undergrad` WHERE (CONCAT(`courseTitle`,' - ',`fullTitle`) = 'GEOG 199 - Independent Studies in Geography');

data.description: Independent geographical research conducted under the guidance of Geography faculty. Topic and scope varies, as specified by student and supervisory faculty member prior to registration.
data.preReq: Upper-division standing; completion of two upper-division courses in geography; consent of instructor.
data.messages: INSTRUCTOR APPROVAL REQUIRED TO FINALIZE REGISTRATION.
